content: whether you re enjoying a hot bowl of soup or a chilly scoop of ice cream this cozy keeps your hands protected it makes an awesome gift for friends and family supplies needed approx 115 yds of lion brand 24/7 in aqua and 11 yds of creamsicle approx 65 yds if you use a different brand 4 medium-weight cotton yarn please see yarn notes about the yarn weight use cotton yarn if you plan to use the bowl cozy in the microwave 5 mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge scissors yarn needle tape measure stitch markers terms used and abbreviations pattern is written in us terminology back loop only - blo chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet repeat - repeat single_crochet - single_crochet skip - skip slip_stitch - slip_stitch stitch es - st s space es - space s * - repeat directions given from * just a few yarn notes if you choose to use a different yarn holding one strand of yarn instead of holding two can work for the color work you could use an ombre or a contrasting color i have provided a photo of using sugar and cream in yellow and beach house so you can get an idea of what that looks like the blue one is from my yarn stash so it could be any brand but it s so pretty remember to stick with cotton yarn if you plan on using the cozy in the microwave acrylic could melt finished measurements the bottom diameter is 4 the top diameter is 7 and its depth is 2 25 this cozy fits a 6 soup bowl
